name: Tyrannus: Immortal of Rome
description: Gaius Tyrannus loyally served Rome as an officer in Julius Caesar’s legions. While on campaign in Gaul, he and his men are ambushed by hostile natives. After a desperate battle, Tyrannus and his men are killed and left to rot. However, weeks later, Tyrannus wakes after being taken care of by a mysterious old man. Now, gifted with immortality, Tyrannus cannot die. He believes this is a gift from the Gods that will allow him to serve Rome as its everlasting defender. But Tyrannus’ faith is shaken when Caesar uses his abilities for his gain as Rome is thrust into a brutal civil war that will change the course of history.
